definition: rich country/make the country wealthy (political slogan)

lit. rich country, strong army (idiom); slogan of legalist philosophers in pre-Han times/Make the country wealthy and the military powerful, slogan of modernizers in Qing China and Meiji Japan (Japanese pronunciation: Fukoku kyōhei)
to make the country rich and the people at peace

sentences.english: Do poor countries have a self-interested economic case to help the rich?
sentences.chinese: 窮國幫助富國是否有自己的經濟利益？

sentences.english: Ultimately, this reflects the resentments of a poor neighbor against a richer one.
sentences.chinese: 從根本上講，這反映出窮國對於鄰近富國的憎恨。

sentences.english: Even in rich countries, farmers are responding to many things other than food markets.
sentences.chinese: 即使是在富國，農民對很多信號有反應而非糧食市場。

sentences.english: Abby Dobson performs I'm Not Missing You at the Northcote Social Club.
sentences.chinese: 艾比道布森執行，我不會錯過您在羅富國社會俱樂部。

sentences.english: By contrast, rich nations suffer from deep sunk costs and entrenched vested interests.
sentences.chinese: 與之相比，富國將遭殃於深厚的隱沒成本及既得利益。

sentences.english: We can't rely on donors in rich countries to solve all problems.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能依賴富國的援助者解決所有問題。

sentences.english: Razed long division skills", it studied the Western advanced technology to enrich our country."
sentences.chinese: 師夷長技“是學習西方先進技術來富國強民。

sentences.english: Chinese Environmental Protection Administration fines leather factories from rich countries every year.
sentences.chinese: “中國環保部門每年都爲富國皮革廠開出罰單”。

sentences.english: In return, rich-country companies can offset a portion of their own (capped) emissions.
sentences.chinese: 做爲回報，富國公司可以抵消一部分受限的碳排放。

sentences.english: Yet it would at least be feasible, fiscally and politically, for rich ones.
sentences.chinese: 但它至少對富國而言在財政和政治上是可行的。

sentences.english: This seems like a recipe for alienating rich countries.
sentences.chinese: 這似乎是離間富國不錯的法子。

sentences.english: Life expectancies between rich and poor countries can differ by as much as 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 富國與窮國之間期望壽命的差異可高達40年。

sentences.english: Building a modern, strong and wealthy country is the modern Chinese historical mission.
sentences.chinese: 建設現代化實現民富國強是近代中國的歷史使命。

sentences.english: These are stand-by lines of credit that the IMF maintains with its richest member countries.
sentences.chinese: 這是IMF的富國成員所維持的備用信用額度。

sentences.english: They say rich countries get richer, while poor countries struggle to repay.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，富國愈富，而窮國爲還貸不斷掙扎。

sentences.english: Our people are in no need of richer nations' largess .
sentences.chinese: 我國人民不需要富國的慷慨的贈與。

definition: Asian area/the Far East/Asia Pacific region
Yongfeng county in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable

Greater China/refers to China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (esp. in finance and economics)/refers to all areas of Chinese presence (esp. in the cultural field), including parts of Southeast Asia, Europe and the Americas
to invest in stock/to buy shares
